title: University of North Carolina's Personal File
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:component:wide-image-sizer]]
[[module css]]
a#history-button, a#files-button {
display: none;
}
[[/module]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:foxtrot]]
[[module CSS]]
:root {
    --header-title: "North Carolina";
    --page-font-size: 0.95rem;
    --header-subtitle: "Where Griffins are Found";
    --logo-img: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/component:pride-highlighter/lsb_logo.svg);
}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[tabview]]
[[tab My Articles]]
**[[[torn strings| Torn Strings]]]** and **[[[the city sings| The City Sings]]]** - Co-written with [[*user MarigoldsInJanuar]], our entries into PDcon remixing the Little Mermaid and Circe from the Odyssey. 

**[[[thereisnohope| THEREISNOHOPE]]]** - //Everything is red.// 2024 Art Exchange bonus gift for [[*user Dino--Draws]], finally contributing to a canon I absolutely love. Go listen to Pinkshift. My tenth tale, and a damn good one at that.

**[[[spooky scary skeletons| Spooky Scary Skeletons]]]** - //Transitioning is scary as hell. Spooky, even.// More F120A, the grind never stops! Started as a shitpost, became a bit too serious. Result is a weird blend of comedy and raw emotion, but I've been told it works!

**[[[beauty and the beast| Of Beauty and Beasts]]]** - //Once upon a time, there was a monster that lived in a castle.// Eventyr tale and a sequel to A Matter of Perception, my trans 096 tale from Remixcon. Probably one of my best works, super proud of how this turned out.

**[[[queen mab vs the moon monsters| Queen Mab vs. The Moon Monsters, The Musical]]]** - //A tragedy in three acts.// Yet another F120A post.

**[[[scp-8297| SCP-8297 - Snuffed Out]]]** - //Cadavers within SCP-8297 do not decay.// Written for No Return's Threshold (!!!) timeline and posted on my birthday. These two things are not related.

**[[[under-pressure| Ourselves, Under Pressure]]]** - //Gamers Against Weed's inner circle struggles under Procedure Pizzicato, while the Washington Virion ravages the world.// Written with [[*user diogene_s]] for the 8000 Dead Rats series.

**[[[one more tomorrow| One More Tomorrow]]]** - //Snippets of a world under Pizzicato.// An 8000 Dead Rats megacollab with 25 other authors, also known as an achievement badge cheat code.

**[[[It's Always Darkest| Always Darkest]]]** - //Iris Dark takes care of family business.// Written for From 120's Archives.

**[[[scp-8050| VNP-8050 - One to Rule Them All]]]** - //Vanguard faces the ghosts of the past.// Written for the SCP-8000 Contest, alongside [[*user diogene_s]], [[*user damian thorne]] and [[*user WarriorOfChaos]].

**[[[Paper Bag| Paper Bag]]]** - //Avigail Sigal is in love in the worst way possible.// Written for the 2023 Art Exchange as a gift to [[*user Parfstar]]

**[[[scp-7731| SCP-7731 - Hallowon't]]]** - //Hiba Nasser is not a fan of the holiday season.//

**[[[A Matter of Perception| A Matter of Perception]]]** - //When you're a reality bender, how you view yourself becomes infinitely more dangerous.// Written for RemixCon 2023.

**[[[scp-7309 | SCP-7309 - i accidentally hit save instead of save draft and now this is a keter-class containment breach]]]** - //Avigail's first day on the job doesn't go as well as she hoped.// Written for Goblincon 2023 for the "Deletion" prompt. A collab with the lovely [[*user typoenjoyer]].

**[[[grant request for the usage of biological signaling molecule| GRANT REQUEST FOR THE USAGE OF BIOLOGICAL SIGNALING MOLECULES TO PROMOTE INTERPERSONAL COLLABORATION IN THE WORKPLACE]]]** - //Desperation.// My first and only article to have been featured on the front page.

**[[[Thump-Thump Tick-Tock| Thump-Thump, Tick-Tock]]]** - //A Mekhanite assassin has a crisis of faith in the wake of the Impasse.// First ever post was a coldpost, but in my defense it //was// written for ColdpostCon 2023. Ending is a bit rushed due to deadline constraints, I'll come back to edit this one day.
[[/tab]]
[[tab The Griffin of UNC]]

**University Class:** Public

**Carolina Class:** North

**Griffin Class:** Yes

Hi! I'm UNCGriffin[[footnote]]Not actually from North Carolina, but I spent a very important part of my life there when I was young[[/footnote]](she/her), a small-time author on the Wiki. I'm a big fan of canons, especially On Guard 43, From 120's Archives and No Return, and can talk for hours on them if left unchecked. As such you can usually find me hanging out in the CANONEXUS Discord server.


I usually write light-hearted, slice-of-life fiction, though recently I've branched out a bit more and written a few more serious pieces. My interests include The Magnus Archives, The Mechanisms, Morrowind, TTRPGs, and transgender lesbianism. I read roughly half of the articles I consume on the treadmill's browser while I run.

I'm also a translator and Admin of the gestating Hebrew Branch of the SCP Wiki, which you can find a link to [http://scpwiki-he.wikidot.com here]. If you're a Hebrew speaker, join our Discord!

[[=]]
[[include component:sybadge code=scl]]
[[include component:sybadge code=clb]]
[[include component:sybadge code=lgbt]]
[[include component:sybadge code=tsf]]
[[include component:sybadge code=awb]]
[[include component:sybadge code=pvr]]
[[include component:sybadge code=tlt]]
[[/=]]

**Authorial Will**
If I ever disappear for more than one year from both the Wiki and Discord, I leave my collab pages to their respective co-authors. My solo work, I leave in the custody of [[*user typoenjoyer]], who also has my phone number.
[[/tab]]
[[tab Plagiarism Wall]]
Write whatever here. Or don't, I'm not your mom.

"♪North Carolina, what a wonderful state. It ain't no passing STATE!!!♪" -Researcher [[*user IHearVoices]]

That sign can't stop me because I can't read! - [[*user NewFoundDanger]]

This is the only time I've seen my state be mentioned by someone who doesn't live here - [[*user MrMeltingPoint]]

First time I've been in North Carolina. And I'm stuck in this uni's janitor closet. Someone let me out of here! - [[*user Diogene_s]]

How the hell did I get to North Carolina, and why is the janitor's closet rattling so much? Creepy stuff! - [[*user Lemonsense]]

I just want to say for the record that I actually really like North Carolina. Every time I've visited it's been a great experience. There's this little highway town called Boone that I really like. Hang on what were we talking about again - [[*user Deadcanons]]

[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]
